findings.contract_evidence: Contractor's total liability under this Agreement shall not exceed the amount of fees paid by Client in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.
findings.issue_explanation: Liability cap must be at least 200% of total fees. Current cap is inadequate.

suggested_edit.current_text: Contractor's total liability under this Agreement shall not exceed the amount of fees paid by Client in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.
suggested_edit.proposed_text: Contractor's total liability under this Agreement shall not exceed 200% of the total fees paid by Client.

deletions.text: Contractor's total liability under this Agreement shall not exceed the amount of fees paid by Client in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.

insertions.text: Contractor's total liability under this Agreement shall not exceed 200% of the total fees paid by Client.

suggested_edit.rationale: Aligns liability cap with policy requirement for minimum 200% of total fees.

findings.contract_evidence: All work product created by Contractor shall remain the property of Contractor.
findings.issue_explanation: Company must own all deliverables. Current clause grants ownership to Contractor.

suggested_edit.current_text: All work product created by Contractor shall remain the property of Contractor.
suggested_edit.proposed_text: All work product created by Contractor shall be the property of Client.

deletions.text: All work product created by Contractor shall remain the property of Contractor.

insertions.text: All work product created by Contractor shall be the property of Client.

suggested_edit.rationale: Ensures Company ownership of deliverables as per policy.

findings.contract_evidence: Client shall pay all outstanding fees within ninety (90) days.
findings.issue_explanation: Payment terms exceed 30 days. Must be revised to comply with policy.

suggested_edit.current_text: Client shall pay all outstanding fees within ninety (90) days.
suggested_edit.proposed_text: Client shall pay all outstanding fees within thirty (30) days.

deletions.text: Client shall pay all outstanding fees within ninety (90) days.

insertions.text: Client shall pay all outstanding fees within thirty (30) days.

suggested_edit.rationale: Aligns payment terms with policy requirement of 30 days.

findings.contract_evidence: Each party agrees to maintain confidentiality of the other party's information for a period of two (2) years following disclosure.
findings.issue_explanation: Confidentiality term must be 5 years post-termination, not 2 years.

suggested_edit.current_text: Each party agrees to maintain confidentiality of the other party's information for a period of two (2) years following disclosure.
suggested_edit.proposed_text: Each party agrees to maintain confidentiality of the other party's information for a period of five (5) years following disclosure.

deletions.text: Each party agrees to maintain confidentiality of the other party's information for a period of two (2) years following disclosure.

insertions.text: Each party agrees to maintain confidentiality of the other party's information for a period of five (5) years following disclosure.

suggested_edit.rationale: Extends confidentiality term to meet policy requirement.
